A

addObservedContext(ApplicationContext) - Method in class com.payu.ratel.tests.RatelTestContext
Register a given context so that all Ratel services produced by it will be observed by this RatelTestContext.
afterTestMethod(TestContext) - Method in class com.payu.ratel.tests.RatelIntegrationTestExecutionListener
Closes all contexts registered in the RatelTestContext during test method execution.

B

beforeTestMethod(TestContext) - Method in class com.payu.ratel.tests.RatelIntegrationTestExecutionListener
Starts all services given in RatelTest.registerServices() and waits until they are successfully registered in the test registry server.

C

H

hasService(Class<?>) - Method in class com.payu.ratel.tests.RatelTestContext
Verifies if a test registry server bound to this context has registered at least one instance of a service with a given contract.

P

prepareTestInstance(TestContext) - Method in class com.payu.ratel.tests.RatelIntegrationTestExecutionListener
Configures the context in such a way that the service registy server has a new unique port, and all provided application contexts are configured to use it.

R

RatelIntegrationTestExecutionListener - Class in com.payu.ratel.tests
This test execution listener adds ratel testing capabilities to JUnit tests annotated with RatelTest annotation.
RatelIntegrationTestExecutionListener() - Constructor for class com.payu.ratel.tests.RatelIntegrationTestExecutionListener
 
RatelTest - Annotation Type in com.payu.ratel.tests
This annotation, placed over a test run by the SpringJUnit4ClassRunner decorates it with Ratel Ratel testing capabilities, so that you can control services registration/ unregistration during the test execution.
RatelTestContext - Class in com.payu.ratel.tests
A context that is bound to a test with ratel-testing capabilities.
RatelTestContext() - Constructor for class com.payu.ratel.tests.RatelTestContext

waitForServicesRegistration() - Method in class com.payu.ratel.tests.RatelTestContext
